name: Horror Vacui (chrstphfr)
description:
HORROR VACUI is an experimental videogame I made in 2012, that deals with the subjectivity of the memory and takes place in the world of thought of a patient in a comatose condition.
The player can explore this world, that is represented by rooms and objects.
Found fragments of memory affect the content of the following fragments, making it necessary to play it more the one time.
There is no winning or loosing, no enemies.

How to play HORROR VACUI:
Press W to move forward.
Press S to move backwards.
Press A to move left.
Press D to move right.
Move your mouse to look around.
Interact with objects by looking at them.
Press Ecs to quit.
